name: interface/page/submit
description: Submit a form on a web page. Use interface/page/forms to discover forms, interface/page/fill to populate fields, then this command to submit. Returns the resulting page state after submission.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL of the page containing the form

params.name: values
params.description: Optional: fill these values before submitting (combines fill + submit)

params.name: waitForNavigation
params.description: Wait for page navigation after submit (default: true)

params.name: waitForSelector
params.description: Wait for this selector on the result page

results.name: navigatedTo
results.description: The URL after form submission (may be same page or new page)

results.name: pageContent
results.description: Brief summary of the result page content (first 500 chars of visible text)

results.name: hasMoreForms
results.description: Whether the result page has forms (call interface/page/forms to discover)

results.name: hint
results.description: Guidance on what to do with the result page
